text: Pyrausta tetraplagalis is a moth in the family Crambidae. It is found in the Democratic Republic of Congo (Katanga, Equateur) and Zimbabwe.Afro Moths The wingspan is about 16 mm. The forewings are black with an orange subbasal band. The hindwings are black with an orange basal area.Proc. Zool. Soc. London 1899: 268 ==References== Category:Moths described in 1899 tetraplagalis Category:Moths of Africa
title: Pyrausta tetraplagalis
